channel.title: Several Problems
channel.description:
1. How do I make starter only once?
2. How do I remove the webs by mage bank?
3. How do I make ancients hit regular because mine hits 4's as max?

item.title: Several Problems
item.dc:creator: @maxxy maxxy
item.description:
@maxxy wrote:

add this with your commands for starter:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {
	if (starter == 0) {
	    addItem(995, 50000000);
	    sendMessage("The starter packet for ServerName players !");
	    starter = 1;
	} else if (starter == 1) {
	    sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !");
	}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Several Problems
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

  1. a case is basically a feedback of clicking something in game.
    the cases for objects and stuff use their object ID…so object 100 would look like
    case 100:
    feedback to the player
    break;

break ends the case, and if you want do add multiple cases and make them give the same feedback you ‘stack’ them i guess idk what to call it

case 9132:
case 458:
case 157:
case 11757:
feedback
break;

if you look into your source you should find ReplaceObject or ReplaceObject2
i dont know what the difference is but use ReplaceObject
what it does is replace the object with the ID you input, and places it on the coords you input
this is exactly what you need to make webs work at mb instead of them just teleporting you :]!
GL finding the id for a slashed web, sorry

  1. search “ice barrage” and you will see
    hitDiff = # + misc.random(#);
    hitdiff is the hit and misc.random is the varied hit that depends on your mage bonus

post for more help

Read full topic

item.title: Several Problems
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

  1. i only know half of that solution, thus i wont bother

2.add a case that does "replaceobject(newID, absX, absY);
and replaces a full web with a slashed one
and maybe if you want the weapon anims

3.you will see hitDiff = # + misc.random(#);
hitdiff is a hit and misc.random is the difference that bonuses effect

post for more help

Read full topic
